data.name: The Secret of Middle City Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to "The Secret of Middle City".

This game is an "old-style" graphic adventure inspired by the 80ies and 90ies "point 'n click" videogames which uses a peculiar italian-style humor and visuals.

The story unfolds in a tipical North American mountain town and sees the main character strive among mysteries and false leads in order to solve a case of presumed homicide.

The player will visit over 50 locations and will interact with 60 plus non-playing characters before shedding light on the plot and finally be able to solve the case.
data.about_the_game:

The player will visit over 50 locations and will interact with 60 plus non-playing characters before shedding light on the plot and finally be able to solve the case.
data.short_description: An old style point and click adventure, full of humor and fun characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 1.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: On-board graphic card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard on-board sound card
